_sText: This is my first release. Hope you enjoy it. -------------------- cs_desperados -------------------- a map by jackennils inspired by the games "Desperados" and "Desperados 2: Cooper's Revenge" © Spellbound and ATARI credits to Karatekäfer for his awesome skybox texture big thx to all beta testers especially my friends at [GGN] (www.gungame-naps.6x.to) -------------------- Mexican terrorists took four hostages to their old hideout in the mountains. The counterterrorists have to rescue them. -------------------- working time: ~ 75 hours size: 36 MB (zipped: 15 MB) -------------------- more details, screenshots and a highres video can be found here: www.jackennils.6x.to a video says more than 1000 words.... (the video is from the first beta)
